page.title: 06Education in Golspie.
page.content: Children of primary school age attend{Golspie Primary School}which is the only primary school in the village.The primary department of the school has a role of 172 children. (1985) The school also has a nursery department, which takes children in the year before they start their primary education.(All local children attend the nursery,-there is no waiting list.) Children of secondary school age are more fortunate than other children in Sutherland as they can complete their full secondary education at{Golspie {High School.}Other secondary schools in Sutherland are either 2-year or 4-year secondaries and the children of these schools have to move on to Golspie to do a full six years.These children are either bused to Golspie daily or live near-by in hostels.
